## NS.nuke() method

Runs the NUKE.exe program on the target server. NUKE.exe must exist on your home computer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
nuke(host: Host): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  host | [Host](./bitburner.host.md) | Hostname or IP of the target server. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

0.05 GB

## Example


```js
nuke("foodnstuff");
```
